name: Speed of Slime
description:
Title: Speed of Slime

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:  This is a game about living long and scoring high!

Instructions: 

Press and hold the Left and Right arrow keys to move left and right.

Press and hold Space to continuously jump/wall jump.  Release Space to stop jumping.

Press and release Z to dash.  Dash into a wall after jumping off of it to jump higher up the same wall

Press and hold the Down arrow key to fast fall.  Release down to stop fast falling.

Collect items to increase your score, increase your max health, restore your current health, and increase the amount of time you have left. 

 When the red bar above your head fills up, you will lose.  Collecting clock items and entering new rooms will both decrease the fullness of the bar, as well as increase the amount of time it takes to fill up.

Game Design Team: Bryson Pitzer – Game Designer
